DOC.detailed_description: AIM : The aim study compare effect lifestyle intervention ( diet physical activity ) apply modern approach lifestyle change prevention incident type 2 diabetes ( T2DM ) worsen hyperglycemia people high number T2DM risk allele people low number T2DM risk allele compare correspond control group . STUDY GROUPS . A total 600 participant select METabolic Syndrome In Men ( METSIM ) study . They divide two group : ) high genetic risk T2DM basis genetic risk score ( N=300 ) , b ) low genetic risk score T2DM basis genetic risk score ( N=300 ) . For group correspond control group ( N=300 ) select . PROTOCOL . 1 ) The first visit entry ( visit 1 ) intervention control group : interview physical activity work leisure time , smoking , alcohol use , education , occupation , diet , history medication ; clinical measurement : blood pressure , body weight , height , bioimpedance ; laboratory measurement include oral glucose tolerance test , fast measurement ( HbA1c , total cholesterol , HDL cholesterol , total triglyceride , ALT , GAD antibody ) ; 2 ) Group session ( 15 participant ) 1-7 described intervention group control group , 3 ) A 6 month 24 month visit ( identical visit 1 ) intervention group control group ; 4 ) A 3-year visit intervention control group ( identical visit 1 ) . Detailed protocol intervention group : Dietary guidance intervention group base Nordic Finnish nutrition recommendation emphasize appropriate energy intake , meal frequency , consumption fruit vegetables berriers , quality dieatry fat cardohydrates , include sugar fiber intake . During intervention goal nutrient food intake ( healthy diet ) : Vegetables , fruit berry > = 500 g/day , carbohydrates 45-60 E % , sucrose < 10 E % , fiber > =35 g/day , fat 25-40 E % , saturate fat < 10 E % , unsaturated fat > = 2/3 total fat E % , monosaturated fat 10-20 E % , polysaturated fat 5-10 E % , n-3 fatty acid > = 1E % . The goal physical activity brisk walk minimum 30 min/day least five day week . Walking could replace type exercise ( e.g . cycling , crioss-country skiing , resistance training , housework leaft rake ) ; The first year intervention active include 4-6 group session depend participant ' need . Group sessions intervention group : Session1 ( month 1 ) : Motivation 4-day food record personal feedback food record participant .
